/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image presents a tranquil scene of a tree-lined street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The trees, standing tall on both sides of the street, form a natural canopy, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the serene ambiance.

The street itself is paved with gray asphalt, its surface smooth and well-maintained. It stretches out into the distance, inviting one to take a leisurely stroll and soak in the peaceful surroundings.

On the right side of the street, there's a dirt path that seems to lead to an unseen destination. It's a quiet path, devoid of any human presence at the moment, adding to the sense of tranquility.

The image is captured from a low angle, giving a unique perspective to the viewer. It's as if we're standing right there on the street, looking up at the towering trees and the vast blue sky. The perspective also emphasizes the height of the trees and the expanse of the sky.

Overall, the image beautifully captures a moment of calm and serenity in a tree-lined street, under a clear blue sky. It's a snapshot of a peaceful day, where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
